titleStmt.title: A spiritual spicerie containing sundrie sweet tractates of devotion and piety. By Ri. Brathwait, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
Jacobus, de Gruytrode, fl. 1440-1475.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. H[aviland] for George Hutton at his shop within turning stile in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Most of the material is translated from Jacobus de Gruytrode and other authors.

With an additional title page, engraved: A spirituall spicerie; containing sundrie sweete tractats of devotion & piety. London. Printed by I.H. for Geo: Hutton. at [drawing of a turning stile] in Holb:.
Reproduction of the original in Princeton Theological Seminary. Library.
